MOTD: Welcome to a text adventure written using an entity component system based engine called TextWorld. Look around, have fun!

Player.Description: You are the epitome of a hero. You're tall, dapper, strong and ready to take on the world!

Items.Name: leather coin purse
Items.Description: Extremely worn leather purse. The leather is soft and flexible and it's color has faded.

Items.Name: health potion
Items.Description: An oddly shaped bottle with a cool blue liquid inside. The liquid glows with an intense light.

Rooms.Name: Open Field
Rooms.Description: You are standing in an open field. All around you stands tall vibrant green grass. You can hear the sound of flowing water off in the distance which you suspect is a stream.

Rooms.Name: Stream
Rooms.Description: A shallow rocky stream is swifty flowing from your west to east. The water looks approximately one foot deep from where you are standing.

Rooms.Name: Large Rock
Rooms.Description: You are standing beside a large rock. The rock looks out of place with respect to the rest of your surroundings.

Rooms.Name: Old Forest
Rooms.Description: Thick tall trees block your way but seem to have allowed the stream safe passage. It doesn't appear as though you can travel any further in this direction.
